price: A fi èbìbò bo ọkàn wọn nítorí kí wọ́n má baà gbọ́ ọ yé. (A tún fi) èdídí sínú etí wọn. Nígbà tí o bá sì dárúkọ Olúwa rẹ nìkan ṣoṣo nínú al-Ƙur’ān, wọ́n máa pẹ̀yìndà tí wọn yóò máa sá lọ.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ أَكِنَّةً أَن يَفۡقَهُوهُ وَفِيٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَقۡرٗاۚ وَإِذَا ذَكَرۡتَ رَبَّكَ فِي ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَحۡدَهُۥ وَلَّوۡاْ عَلَىٰٓ أَدۡبَٰرِهِمۡ نُفُورٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
